resources.string: Hi! I am a Computer Engineering student currently studying at Sharif University of Technology. I have an interest in both Data Science and Software Engineering and I\'m currently trying to figure out the best route to take for a career.

I Graduated from Allameh Helli High School in June 2020. During that time, I participated in Iran\'s National Mathematics Olympiad as well as the Informatics Olympiad. I Earned a Certificate of Honourable Mention in Mathematics and got accepted into Sharif university by performing well in Iran\'s Nationwide universities\' entrance exam. I am currently a third year Bachelor\'s student.

One of my Volunteer works is being a Teacher\'s Assistant (TA) in multiple courses such as Fundamentals of Programming and Advanced Programming. During my time as a TA, I improved many of my skills such as Helping students with their problems, Working under Time Pressure, Teamwork, etc. Another Volunteer job I took was a Software engineering internship at Mohaymen ITC Company which helped me broaden my knowledge of Object Oriented Programming, Unit testing, Automated testing, and several other useful skills, as well as working in teams to create a practical project.
